Bought this dress for a wedding and the material was thick, hugged in all the right places and I got so many compliments on it. I wore a strapless bra and it worked perfectly. I am 5’8 maybe 5’9, 210-215lbs, 38G, and carry most of my weight on my chest and stomach. First of all, I am thoroughly impressed by the material. It is thick and stretchy and reminds me of the material of Lulu’s dresses (but better). I ordered the XL. This dress fits me perfectly. I would actually say I have a little extra room in it that I wasn’t expecting, but I think a large would be too short. I do wish the dress was a bit longer but I am tall and prefer my dress to almost touch the floor, so not everyone may have the same opinion. The slit is a little more towards the center rather than just on the leg but I kinda like it. And, I got this on deal for $30-32 which is a STEAL. I would say it’s worth the $60-70 price that it’s normally at.

This dress is AMAZINGLY AWESOME!!! Just purchased on 9/4/24 and it arrived 9/5/24, in Black size Medium.  I’m 5’3, 160lbs. very curvy and it fits perfectly.  It holds you in (I wore spanx) without feeling tight because it has spandex (about 5%) which allows the extra stretch.  It’s very comfortable .  Although it’s polyester it’s NOT very hot wearing it especially if you’re in doors with AC, which the venue where I wore this dress had AC.  The length for my height was perfect - I wore about a 4” heel which made it even sexier since with my height.  The quality is great, not see-through, smelled new, I didn’t have a problem with the invisible zipper (was able to pull over my head with no problem) and the black color is amazing!!  Just $40 you can’t go wrong with purchasing this sexy dress and by the way, I received so-o many compliments at the hotel I was stay and also at the event I attended.I usually don’t write reviews - it does help.  I really, really appreciate when other women write about their experiences with an outfit they purchased.  Thank you!  Hope this helps.

I've bought several dresses off Amazon for my sons wedding week coming up, but was still searching for the perfect dress for the ceremony. Well I found it in this dress. I bought it in 2 colors (teal and wine) in an XS which does fit me great. I came back and bought both again in a small for just in case I gain some between now and then. It's not a sizing issue or fit problem- it's just that this is THE dress and I want to make sure I can where it regardless of my weight. It's stretchy enough but I go up and down to extremes sometimes. Very comfortable dress too. I don't think it would be too hot for warmer weather either. I may have my seamstress put a lining in the skirt part just to hide the seams. But I really do love it and it's my favorite out of all the other dresses I've bought off here. Higher quality too than the others. Personally I feel the price is fair for the quality. Fyi- if you are looking at buying the teal color, it's a little darker than in the pictures.... more like a deeper peacock teal blue. But the wine color is on point and accurate. I'm excited to wear this dress!
